name: Last Swing
description:
A prisoner finds himself in bad luck with nowhere to go and a horde of undead approaching, he will need to fight till the last swing!

Last Swing is a physics based sword swinging game where you survive waves of zombies and play with different weapons.

Made as part of Indie Tales Jam.
All created by myself, if the support is there I would love to turn this into a bigger game.
Thanks for playing!
